challenge:
1. I am your daddy, I'll take you to space; One of my projects is Boring; Answer with my name and I'll take you cruising in my awesome Model S.
Ask around for the puzzle when you find me!
hint: My cars always fall in love with pigeons

challenge: 2. I am a famous nebula, hiding in the bull's horns. What's my name and M number?
hint: I share my name with Spongebob's favourite restaurant

challenge: 3. I'm not too hot and not too cold, the only zone where life will hold. Get closer to the sun and burn, get further and become an icicle. What is my name?
4. I was first called LGM,and they thought they found aliens, but I'm just a dense, small mass of neutrons. What am I?
5. Old and reliable, I always point through stars and my typing is static. I have no objects, but I'm always structured. What's my name?
hint: Pointer to pointer to pointer points to me

challenge: 6. I'm your hot coffee, robust and classy, it takes half the lines of code if you write me in Python

7. Trusssst in me...
 Simple is better than complex, 
 Trusssst in me...
 Dynamic typing is better...
 Trusssst in me...
 Don't ever forget to indent me!
8. I only answer yes or no, my roots are in first order logic; If you feel like crying, try writing your code with me.
hint: I am a declarative programming language

challenge: 9. I'm the Greek brother of Sleipnir, up high in the sky, go Google my name and find my brightest alpha star
hint: I have magical powers and wings, and the answer to my riddle is hidden in the stars

challenge: 10. Look up in the sky, past time and date, spot the hidden star to find the next key
hint: tick tock, the end is drawing near

challenge: 11. I'm the head of the small bear and I am not the brightest, but everyone in Hollywood thinks I show the right way. Who am I?
hint: The Pole gives you the name

challenge: 12. I'm glowing in Greek, brightest in the night, I'm brother to all dogs, and spent some time in Azkaban.
hint: I did not betray Lily and James

challenge: 13. In the late hours of night, sitting by the cold campfire, follow the starts to get to the next challenge
hint: It all starts in a quiet place
